law.catch_line: Except as otherwise provided in § 9-210 of this subtitle, an interest in or power over property exi...
law.text: Except as otherwise provided in § 9-210 of this subtitle, an interest in or power over property existing on October 1, 2004, as to which the time for delivering or filing a disclaimer under law superseded by this subtitle has not expired, may be disclaimed after October 1, 2004.
